title: AI-Based Personalized Learning Design: Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized learning environments and AI tool proficiency development for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to enhance social domain task competencies

learning_goals: Learners can accurately select over 80% of social sector microlearning content matching their job characteristics using AI recommendation systems
Learners can interpret AI-generated personalized feedback reports by analyzing individual learning data and establish improvement plans
Learners can complete 90% of project-based learning tasks using AI-powered interactive tools (chatbots, virtual teaching assistants, etc.) in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
